##This is the file which will configure all of the settings for launch
##Place all of you classes which will register a manager here
##All classes placed here must implement cjminecraft.util.ILaunchClass
cjminecraft.engine.Engine
##Do not edit above this line, add classes below

##Launch Options
##Below are all of the options which will be used once the game has booted up
width:1280
height:720
resizable:false
title:#format(window.title)
textures.location:assets/textures
models.location:assets/models
##Camera options
fov:70
far_plane:4000
near_plane:0.1
